New Records: David Warner scored 163 runs, the highest score by an Australian batsman in this World Cup
Key Match Events: David Warner and Mitchell Marsh both scored centuries for Australia
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 5 wickets for 54 runs for Pakistan
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted Australia as the favorites given their strong batting lineup
Post-Match Reflections: David Warner was named Player of the Match for his outstanding performance
Australia's win secured their place in the semi-finals of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played under lights at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru
Others: The win was Australia's second consecutive victory in the World Cup
